dcterms:creator: Junzhe Zhang
Elias Bareinboim
dcterms:description: The MDPUC is an infinite-horizon Partially Observable Markov Decision Process that models the interactions between unobserved confounding variables and observable states, actions, and rewards in a causal framework.
dcterms:title: MDPUC (Markov Decision Process with Unobserved Confounding)
